channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I hope the Toronto-based sports team beats the Tampa Bay-based sports team tonight.
I can‚Äôt believe I live in Toronto. https://t.co/FTt9s7339t
Pandemic milestone: Checkout divider bars are back at the grocery store I normally shop at.
Toronto feels like an American city again.
‚ÄúWe won‚Äôt get in. It‚Äôs encrypted.‚Äù https://t.co/oJyVeqdVLG

I‚Äôm going to Parkdale today.
I bought this charming enamel pin at a plant expo in Parkdale. https://t.co/8XeOAs66gw
I ate this delicious burrito in Parkdale. https://t.co/bXZceoPf8O
Parkdale Pet Foods in, you guessed it, Parkdale, is the site of a microconfluence. https://t.co/26aIkBWW8H
@Celadon_kate Good luck! May the Gods of Clothing You Haven‚Äôt Worn in Half a Year smile upon you!
@Celadon_kate Oof, I made it, just barely, this morning, on the day I switched to wearing shorts for the next 6 months. #dlws
@Kimli Me, if I was your neighbour when you do that: https://t.co/1NkmYl1iOt
@Kimli Interesting. My gold standard for a hot dog is the footlong at Nat Bailey Stadium. It‚Äôs one of the things I miss about Vancouver.
@Kimli I‚Äôve gone to Costco solely for the cheap (and great) hot dogs. I never thought to smuggle in a flask of my preferred fizzy drink though. ü§î
@frantasticx Thanks thanks thanks thanks thanks! I‚Äôm passing this info along!
@slikback Come to Toronto pls.

@BTPBrewing @3030DundasWest I really liked the ambiance. Reasonable prices for everything. Intimate stage. (Not pictured: The free-to-play pinball machines next to it.) I wish I could keep the venue a secret. https://t.co/FfDKYTfOyh
@BTPBrewing @3030DundasWest (Proprietor of the automated ephemera account here.) I‚Äôm more of an IPA guy, so probably that one. I had 3030‚Äôs chicken sandwich with it. https://t.co/RQJQ1Tu8hd
@ReneeStephen The TTC asks so little, and that‚Äôs still too much for them.

I sometimes want to ask people and their friends who don‚Äôt wear a mandatory face covering on the TTC ‚ÄúWhat are the odds that all of you have the same medical condition preventing you from wearing a mask?‚Äù Then I remember that I‚Äôm trying to avoid getting punched in the face.
For the first time, I selected ‚ÄúMOST ARE NOT‚Äù (it also bugs me that it‚Äôs a streetcar I was on, not a train). https://t.co/3HX8XmJh87

Tonight. https://t.co/gUpErpslpd
This is the first concert in a long time where I can sit down and have dinner while I take in the performance. https://t.co/04SFhFqNKM
üé∂ ‚ÄúSteer away from these rocks / We‚Äôd be a walking disaster‚Äù üé∂
üé∂ ‚ÄúWhen I am king / You will be first against the wall / With your opinion / Which is of no consequence at all‚Äù üé∂ https://t.co/0q95vxcQIf
What are the odds that a Radiohead side project would release their album the day after I cried 4 times at a Radiohead cover band‚Äôs concert? https://t.co/2USSOFaA0w
Somebody put the setlist for @radioheadioteq‚Äôs show last night at @3030DundasWest on @setlistfm. https://t.co/KLK7FYHwMJ
Tonight. https://t.co/TOUKqQ2m3P
Toronto sucks. https://t.co/sMp6MI21nC
Just when I thought I was out of the synthesizer world, Teenage Engineering releases an update to their OP-1 and tries to pull me back in. https://t.co/wrP6A5GVG6
If there‚Äôs going to be private security in public parks, that makes them not public parks.
@Kimli #vicwack?

Oops, I guess I missed the @KeybaseIO cryptocurrency $XLM crash of May‚Ä¶2021. #stellarfamily #cryptocrash https://t.co/TZxHbVaHRi
I‚Äôm still hodling since a) the $XLM I have was airdropped, sorry, spacedropped, to me in 2019 and b) it‚Äôs currently ‚Äúworth‚Äù 10x it was back then. https://t.co/CxIXALsitx
I don‚Äôt think the decline in ‚Äúvalue‚Äù of the other illiquid cryptocurrency I‚Äôm hodling, that I got airdropped to me because I was watching a Deadmau5 performance and sent a text message at the right time, $AUDIO, is related to recent cryptocurrency crash. https://t.co/kRVa2GAG3c

I‚Äôm hearing there are still tickets available for the performance by @radioheadioteq, Toronto‚Äôs best Radiohead cover band, on Thursday, and that they will perform two sets of songs. https://t.co/qabB23Prsd
